programme.desc: This hilarious, unrated comedy follows Adam and his three loser friends as they awaken after a night of drinking and hot-tubbing to find themselves back in 1986, where they try to fix all of the mistakes they made when they were younger. programme.title: Dreamer: Inspired by a True Story
programme.desc: A horse trainer sacrifices everything so that his daughter can see their injured horse race again.

programme.title: The Master of Disguise
programme.desc: Dana Carvey is a man of (almost) a thousand faces in this comedy. Carvey plays a humble waiter with a gift for impersonation who learns his family's secret history of assuming other identities after his parents are kidnapped by an old enemy.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: An architect sublets an apartment in San Francisco and finds it haunted by the ghost of its former tenant, who refuses to accept that she's dead. Reese Witherspoon and Mark Ruffalo sparkle in this divinely romantic comic fantasy. Donal Logue, Dina Waters, Ben Shenkman.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Four Navy SEALs battle a small Taliban army during a botched mission in the Afghan mountains in this incredible story based on actual events. Although badly outnumbered, the soldiers receive help from several local villagers, whose code of honor demands that they aid any "guest" they encounter.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Three years after marrying the woman of his dreams, former government hit man Spencer Aimes becomes a walking target for assassins when a multimillion-dollar bounty is put on his head in this exciting action comedy. Now, in order to save both his marriage and his wife, Spencer must uncover who wants him killed and why.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien from another planet, accompanied by a giant robot, lands on Earth to eradicate the human race because of environmental damage inflicted by mankind on the planet. Keanu Reeves stars in this spectacular update of the 1951 sci-fi classic. Jennifer Connelly, Jaden Smith, Kathy Bates, Jon Hamm. Directed by Scott Derrickson.

programme.title: My Life in Ruins
programme.desc: A harried Greek tour guide (Nia Vardalos) leads a ragtag group of tourists around Greece with hilarious results in this winning sun-soaked comedy from director Donald Petrie. Along the way, she manages to open their eyes to the wonders of an exotic land, while she herself begins to see the world in a new light. Richard Dreyfuss, Harland Williams, Rachel Dratch.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A travelling Bible salesman is tasked with taking an orphaned girl to her family. The two have more in common than they first realize and after becoming a quick pair of con artists the orphan is loathe to give the life up.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: In this delightful comedy, Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt play mother-daughter con artists who have made a career out of swindling men out of their fortunes. All goes well until one of them falls for her mark. Gene Hackman, Ray Liotta, Anne Bancroft, Jason Lee, Jeffrey Jones, Nora Dunn.

programme.title: Armageddon

Desperate to stop a gigantic asteroid from wiping out humanity, NASA recruits misfit oil drillers to deliver a nuclear bomb that will blow up the massive rock. Jerry Bruckheimer produced and Michael Bay directed. Steve Buscemi, Liv Tyler, Keith David, Will Patton, Owen Wilson.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: In this riveting sci-fi action film, two scientists race to avert a catastrophe when a series of climate-control satellites malfunction. They soon discover a conspiracy involving the satellites, which were designed to prevent natural disasters on Earth.

Jackson, Patrick Wilson and Kerry Washington star in this taut thriller. Ron Glass, Justin Chambers. Directed by Neil Labute.

In this inspiring biopic, Jackie Robinson breaks Major League Baseball's color barrier when he is signed to the Brooklyn Dodgers by the team's forward-thinking general manager, Branch Rickey. The gifted athlete deals with tremendous pressure and threats from racist fans and players, but perseveres to become a legendary baseball player and a heroic figure in American history.

programme.desc: A husband and wife from Los Angeles, California, "slice up" a new way to eat your favorite flavor-packed condiment with their twist on traditional sauces. programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: A working mom from San Diego impresses the Sharks with how she found time to create a special tool that helps women everywhere; two brothers from Agoura Hills, Cal., recycle old billboards that would otherwise go into landfills; and the Sharks have high compliments for revolutionary lozenges that can prevent overeating. Also: Robert Herjavec recalls how he arrived to North America from Eastern Europe with his parents after escaping Communism in the former Yugoslavia.

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Kevin Hart—actor, investor and entrepreneur—brings his unique perspective and desire to inspire the country's sharpest entrepreneurs in an all-new episode. programme.desc: A posture-correction device is demonstrated by two professional dancers; entertainment reporter Robin Leach helps pitch a line of stone-studded leather jewelry; a Vermont couple try to sell the investors on vegan, gluten-free cookies; and a business idea from a Louisiana woman who calls herself the Diaper Queen. programme.desc: Anonymous high-school student Olive plots to give her popularity a boost by painting herself as the easiest score in school in this hysterical contemporary comedy inspired by Nathaniel Hawthorne's "The Scarlet Letter."

programme.title: No Strings Attached
programme.desc: A reporter finds himself in a web of danger and desire while assigned to a story that has him listening to female fantasies. Vincent Spano, Cheryl Pollak, Michael Mckean. Directed by Josef Rusnak.

programme.title: 2023 NHL Draft Lottery
programme.desc: The top three positions in the 2023 NHL Draft are determined, with 16 teams involved. Only the top 11 teams have a shot at claiming No. 1 (likely to be WHL forward Connor Bedard), led by the Ducks, Blue Jackets, Blackhawks, Sharks, Canadiens, Coyotes, Flyers, Capitals, Red Wings, Blues and Cancuks.

programme.title: Player 54: Chasing the XFL Dream

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Denzel Washington and Meryl Streep star in Jonathan Demme's absorbing remake of the 1962 political thriller. Washington plays a Gulf War vet troubled by nightmares about his time in Kuwait. Liev Schreiber is excellent as a soldier who served under him before returning to the States, where he has embarked on a promising political career. Directors Roger Corman and Sidney Lumet have cameos. Tina Sinatra, whose father Frank starred in the original, co-produced.

programme.title: Source Code
programme.desc: Capt. Colter Stevens (Jake Gyllenhaal) travels back in time and inhabits the body of a male passenger on a Chicago train immediately before a deadly explosion, as part of a mission to find the terrorist responsible and prevent another attack.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Complex drama about an Army warrant officer (John Travolta) investigating the apparent rape and murder of the daughter of a politically ambitious base commander. Madeleine Stowe. James Woods steals several scenes as an intense colonel. William Goldman ("Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid") co-wrote the script from Nelson DeMille's novel. Simon West directed.

programme.title: Bone Daddy
programme.desc: Rutger Hauer as a novelist whose bestseller about a notorious serial killer draws the murderer out of retirement. Barbara Williams.

programme.title: Holy Smoke
programme.desc: Kate Winslet stars in this disturbing and satiric look at how a family copes with a cult. She plays a woman who becomes intrigued by a religious guru while on a trip to India. Her parents hire a deprogrammer in a desperate bid to get their daughter back to normal. Harvey Keitel, Julie Hamilton, Tim Robertson, Sophie Lee. Jane Campion directed and co-wrote (with sister Anna).

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Denzel Washington and Meryl Streep star in Jonathan Demme's absorbing remake of the 1962 political thriller. Washington plays a Gulf War vet troubled by nightmares about his time in Kuwait. Liev Schreiber is excellent as a soldier who served under him before returning to the States, where he has embarked on a promising political career. Directors Roger Corman and Sidney Lumet have cameos. Tina Sinatra, whose father Frank starred in the original, co-produced.

programme.title: Fairy Tale: A True Story
programme.desc: In this fantastic fact-based tale, two British girls claim to have danced with fairies...and have the photos to prove it. Soon, everyone, including Sir Arthur Conan Doyle (Peter O' Toole) and Harry Houdini (Harvey Keitel), comes to believe them, and the world's faith in miracles and magic is restored. Florence Hoath, Elizabeth Earl, Paul McGann, Phoebe Nicholls. Charles Sturridge directed.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears Go to Japan
programme.desc: The little leaguers of the Bad News Bears travel to Japan to take on the country's best young baseball talents. What ensues is a sequel of pint-sized adventures and international mishaps.

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: Four geriatric friends head to Las Vegas for a bachelor party that recaptures the magic of their glory days in this outrageous all-star comedy.

programme.title: Malavita
programme.desc: An American mob boss and his family are relocated to France through the Witness Protection Program in this thrilling action comedy, but they soon draw the attention of some dangerous underworld figures who are determined to see them dead.

programme.title: Boy
programme.desc: In this coming-of-age tale set in 1984, a Michael Jackson-obsessed Maori boy and his brother deal with unexpected problems when their ex-con father returns and tries to retrieve money from a successful robbery.

programme.title: Night Catches Us
programme.desc: In this intriguing drama, former Black Panther Marcus (Anthony Mackie) returns to his hometown after years away, only to find that his old friends still suspect he was involved in the murder of the leader of their organization. Later, Marcus draws closer to the slain man's wife (Kerry Washington) and is stalked by a homeless woman who still believes in the Panthers' cause.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Character study of Harry Caul, an expert wiretapper assigned to surveil a couple in San Francisco. As he learns more about the couple through conversation, Harry wrestles with the notion that his recording could lead to their murder.

programme.title: Zodiac

Jake Gyllenhaal plays newspaper political cartoonist Robert Graysmith, upon whose book the script is based. Mark Ruffalo plays Insp. Dave Toschi, who was the inspiration for the title characters in Steve McQueen's "Bullitt" and Clint Eastwood's "Dirty Harry." Robert Downey Jr. Directed by David Fincher.

programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. programme.desc: Jade, a news producer heads to the Caribbean for relaxation, only to fall victim to a rental scam. Serendipitously, she befriends the real owner, Ford, and discovers fun and romance.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in the incredible true story of a rebel German army officer who led a plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler and overthrow his ruthless Nazi regime during World War II. Bryan Singer ("X-Men") directs this suspenseful thriller. Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: Harriet
programme.desc: The incredible true story of one of America's greatest heroes, Harriet Tubman. From her escape from slavery to the dangerous missions she led, setting free hundreds of slaves through the Underground Railroad.

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: In this observant, well-written comedy/drama, three members of a twelve-step program for sex addiction help each other through various personal struggles including troubled marriages, relapses, and falling in love.

programme.title: 100 Foot Wave
programme.desc: In the fall of 2021 and the start of the new big wave season, Garrett McNamara is now the director of the World Surf League's Tow Surfing Challenge in Nazaré, but eight-month pregnant Nicole McNamara and their young children fall ill with COVID-19, complicating his preparations. When the competition begins in December, Tony Laureano isn't invited to participate with the best in class.

programme.title: Experimenter
programme.desc: Riveting docudrama about renowned social psychologist Stanley Milgram, who conducted controversial experiments in the early 1960s involving subjects' capacity for cruelty and blind obedience.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Kate Hudson and Anne Hathaway are a scream as two lifelong best friends who schedule their dream weddings for the same date, at the same place (New York City's Plaza Hotel) and at the same time and neither is willing to budge.

programme.title: Footloose

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest
programme.desc: Rupert Everett, Colin Firth, Frances O'Connor, Reese Witherspoon, Tom Wilkinson and Judi Dench make for a brilliant cast in this classy adaptation of Oscar Wilde's timeless farce. The story turns on mistaken identity in Victorian England, as two young swains pass themselves off as a fictional character named Ernest in their romantic pursuits.

programme.title: 1000% Me: Growing Up Mixed
programme.desc: Through a series of compelling and insightful conversations, comedian W. Kamau Bell explores the experiences of mixed kids and families in the San Francisco Bay Area. The film was inspired by Kamau and his wife Melissa's desire to better understand what life is like for their mixed daughters, who are navigating issues of identity in a world that often asks them to pick a side. With humor and heart, the film reveals the joys and complexities of growing up mixed in today's America.

programme.title: GoldenEye
programme.desc: James Bond must keep Russian rebels from controlling a high-tech satellite weapons system, which has the potential to destroy all electronic circuits in a targeted area in seconds.

programme.title: Mud

programme.title: Life After Beth
programme.desc: A grieving man's dead girlfriend returns as a zombie, and soon the two are inseparable once again in this charming horror comedy. Over time, though, he realizes that the new version of her isn't the same woman he fell in love with.

programme.title: The Children Act

Luke plays an oil-refinery worker, unjustly arrested and tortured as a terrorist, who turns anti-apartheid revolutionary with a righteous vengeance. Tim Robbins' portrayal of a police official is a picture of subtle evil. Bonnie Henna. Directed by Phillip Noyce. Screenwriter Shawn Slovo's white parents both served as anti-apartheid activists in South Africa.

Meanwhile, Selena's bad behavior threatens her daughter's future on the team; and the squad members question Kayla's leadership as captain.

programme.title: Bring It!
programme.desc: The Dancing Dolls go back to Memphis to compete against rivals the Prancing Tigerettes and the Divas of Olive Branch. Meanwhile, Sunjai earns a spot on the team's Michael Jackson-inspired number; and Kayla asks her dad to attend one of her performances.

programme.title: Bring It!

programme.title: Bring It!
programme.desc: The Dancing Dolls defend their title of "The Best Dance Team in Jackson" in a hometown battle against local rivals the Purple Diamonds. programme.title: Bring It!
programme.desc: Dianna calls for an all-night rehearsal when the Dancing Dolls struggle to master some difficult stands as they prepare to compete against the rival Dynamic Diamond Dollz in Memphis. Meanwhile, Sunjai shines in a burlesque routine.

programme.title: Bring It!
programme.desc: Season 1 ends with the Dancing Dolls competing in a winner-take-all "Battle Royale." The dancers feel extra pressure to perform well when they learn that the judges are professional dancers and choreographers who may be looking to discover someone.

programme.title: Bring It!

programme.desc: Season 2 begins with Miss D holding team tryouts for veteran dancers and new hopefuls. Meanwhile, Tamia challenges Camryn for the coveted head co-captain position; and Crystianna battles nerves as she attempts to perform her first solo.

programme.title: Bring It!
programme.desc: The Dancing Dolls compete against their rivals in the Bay Area Battle in Memphis, but several of the dancers and their moms fear a risky strategy by Miss D will cost them the win. Meanwhile, Sunjai is forced to choose between performing or attending her high school prom.

programme.title: Bring It!
programme.desc: The Dancing Dolls compete against rivals in Jackson, Miss., where Miss D decides to attempt the team's first-ever lyrical routine. But the dancers struggle with the choreography. Meanwhile, Kayla gets a surprise from the team for her high school prom.

programme.title: Bring It!
programme.desc: The Dancing Dolls travel to Nashville to take on squads from all over the South. Meanwhile, the moms plot to spy on Miss D in the dance studio and hold a bake sale to fund their scheme; and Kayla's leadership is questioned by Miss D and the Dolls.

programme.title: Bring It!

programme.title: Dr. No
programme.desc: James Bond winds up on a Jamaican island in search of clues in the death of a fellow agent and finds himself up against a despot.

programme.title: Thunderball
programme.desc: James Bond tracks an espionage enterprise that is using stolen nuclear bombs to extort money in exchange for not detonating them.

programme.title: You Only Live Twice
programme.desc: James Bond must locate a space capsule, which went down near Japan, before World War III breaks out.

programme.title: Diamonds Are Forever
programme.desc: While on the trail of stolen jewels, Secret Agent James Bond must try to stop a plan by Ernst Blofeld to take over the world by forcing powerful nations to give up their weapons. This would be Sean Connery's next-to-last Bond film.

programme.title: The Man with the Golden Gun
programme.desc: James Bond tries to locate a powerful weapon while outwitting a criminal mastermind with a small but ruthless henchman who means to end 007's life. This was Roger Moore's second outing as the famous fictional spy.

programme.title: Moonraker
programme.desc: Agent 007 James Bond must thwart Sir Hugo Drax, who plans to wipe out all of humankind and replace it with a super race that he has cultivated in a massive space station. "Jaws," the steel-mouthed henchman, makes a return appearance in "Moonraker," turning good guy in the process.

programme.title: Octopussy
programme.desc: Special agent 007 receives the usual call to come and visit M when another agent drops off a fake Fabergé jeweled egg at the British embassy in East Berlin and is later killed at a traveling circus.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: An action-packed sci-fi thriller about a sexy secret agent who is assigned to bring down the tyrannical ruler of a totalitarian regime in the 25th century.

programme.title: Winter's Bone
programme.desc: Ozarks teen Ree searches for her criminal father after he skips bail. If she doesn't find him fast, her family will be homeless. But tracking him down will require Ree to break her community's unofficial code of silence, which some of her family members see as unforgivable.

programme.title: The One I Love
programme.desc: A troubled married couple make a startling discovery that forces them to confront their fears during what was supposed to be a romantic retreat.

programme.title: Dude, Where's My Car?
programme.desc: Two slackers have an excellent adventure in this riotous comedy. After a wild night they don't remember, dimwits Jesse (Ashton Kutcher) and Chester (Seann William Scott) search valiantly for Jesse's missing car. Along the way, they encounter a money-hungry transsexual stripper, a spacy group of extraterrestrial loonies and killer ostriches. Kristy Swanson, Hal Sparks.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: Blake Edwards wrote and directed this sendup with Ellen Barkin as a murdered womanizer reincarnated as a female. Jimmy Smits. Margo: JoBeth Williams. Sheila: Lorraine Bracco. Steve: Perry King. Arnold: Tony Roberts. Devil: Bruce Martyn Payne. Liz: Lysette Anthony.

programme.title: The Five Heartbeats
programme.desc: Keenen Ivory Wayans and Robert Townsend (who also directed and stars as the lead singer) co-wrote this story of a 1960s singing group trying to hit it big. Michael Wright, Tico Wells. J.T.: Leon. Dresser: Harry J. Lennix.

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: While a man is away on a business trip, his wife (Keira Knightley) considers cheating on him with an old flame in this intimate drama. Meanwhile, he finds himself drawn to a sultry new coworker. Directed by Massy Tadjedin.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A charming Cameron Diaz stars as an uptight stock trader who meets and marries immature slacker Ashton Kutcher one drunken night in Las Vegas. They agree to an annulment---until he wins a $3 million jackpot with her quarter. Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: Nerds of the world unite in this disarmingly funny sleeper. A rural high-school geek with a very bizarre family hatches a plan to get a girlfriend and become cool by helping his equally odd friend run for class president.

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: Best Actress nominee Ellen Page stars as a sassy teen who becomes pregnant after her first sexual encounter and decides to give up her baby to a well-off couple. A sharp and witty slice-of-life comedy that was up for Best Picture and Best Director (Jason Reitman). First-time screenwriter Diablo Cody won the Oscar for Best Original Screenplay. Michael Cera, J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: A Thousand Words
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, high-powered literary agent Jack McCall learns that he has only 1000 words left to speak before dying, due to a curse placed on him by a disgruntled spiritual guru whom he lied to and cheated.

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Following a ridiculously awful flight that leads to his pet's death, Nashawn Wade files a lawsuit against the airline, and wins a multimillion-dollar settlement. Determined to create a better flying experience, Nashawn starts his own airline, one that caters to an African-American clientele. Going into business with a tricked-out plane piloted by the smooth Capt. Mack, the airline hits a snag when it has to deal with the family of Elvis Hunkee.

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn, Diane Keaton are delightfully wacky in this comedy about three reunited college friends who join forces to plan the perfect revenge scheme against their philandering husbands. Dan Hedaya, Stockard Channing, Victor Garber, Maggie Smith, Bronson Pinchot, Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: Tammy
programme.desc: After discovering that her husband is cheating on her, a woman embarks on a road trip to Niagara Falls with her foulmouthed, hard-drinking grandma in this uproarious comedy.

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti and Thomas Haden Church are superb in this wise and witty comedy-drama about two restless buddies who take a trip to California's wine country the week before one of them gets married.

programme.title: William Shakespeare's 'Romeo & Juliet'
programme.desc: A slick, fast-paced update of the Shakespeare tragedy, set in the violent netherworld of Verona Beach, where the Montague and Capulet families battle for power and territory... an age-old rivalry defied by two young lovers. Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Brian Dennehy, John Leguizamo, Pete Postlethwaite, Paul Sorvino, Diane Venora, Harold Perrineau, Paul Rudd, Jesse Bradford, Dash Mihok.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: Struggling author Eddie Morra (Bradley Cooper) overcomes his writer's block with a new drug that unlocks the full potential of his brain, and he forges a partnership with a powerful businessman (Robert De Niro) in this inventive, exciting thriller. Meanwhile, some dangerous characters discover Eddie's secret and come gunning for his dwindling supply of the pharmaceutical.

programme.title: Next
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this explosive action thriller about a Las Vegas magician who's enlisted by an FBI agent (Julianne Moore) to help prevent a terrorist attack because he can see two minutes into the future. Jessica Biel, Thomas Kretschmann, Tory Kittles. Directed by Lee Tamahori.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A 21st-century construction worker discovers that his entire memory of the past derives from a chip implanted in his brain.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: In this hysterical comedy, fraternal twin brothers are shocked when their mother reveals that she doesn't know who fathered them during her wild partying in the 1970s. The duo soon set out on a road trip to try to find their biological dad.

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Bound to stir up good and bad memories of an adolescent rite of passage, director Rawson Marshall Thurber's outrageous nerds-vs.-jocks comedy pits a misfit dodgeball team against a squad sponsored by a corporate giant. Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn, Christine Taylor, Rip Torn, Stephen Root, Gary Cole, Jason Bateman, Justin Long, Joel David Moore, Alan Tudyk, Chris Williams.

programme.desc: In the sweltering summer of 1962, a prominent Louisiana family begins to fall apart, as a 10-year-old girl uncovers truths about her philandering father that will change their lives forever. Samuel L. Jackson, Jurnee Smollett, Meagan Good. Kasi Lemmons directed.

programme.title: Valley Girl
programme.desc: Deborah Foreman as a teenager who's popular (totally), spoiled (to the max) and on the prowl (fer shure). Randy: Nicolas Cage. Loryn: Elizabeth Daily. Martha Coolidge directed.

programme.title: Guest Artist
programme.desc: Joseph Harris, a legendary, but troubled playwright comes to small Michigan town at Christmastime to mount his latest play. Greeting the cynical New Yorker is a young, aspiring writer who challenges his hero to be the icon he'd idolized. However, Harris wants no part of Michigan, small towns and he has no interest in being the young man's hero. The young man must face his hero and navigate the relationship between heroes, reality and hope.

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: Fact-based story about a neurologist who tries to revive a near-comatose patient.

programme.title: Good Mourning
programme.desc: London Clash is a rising actor looking for his next big role. He sets a meeting with a big producer in hopes of landing a role that will catapult his acting career. On the morning of the meeting, he wakes up to a break-up text from his girlfriend, Apple. What follows is a mad spiral where Clash must choose between saving the love of his life and securing his future as an actor.

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Cole Trickle, a young stock-car driver, has talent but no idea how to hone his skills. Veteran racer Harry Hodge is hired to build a car for Trickle and to instill in the hot-shot driver a winning philosophy so he can compete at the top level.

programme.title: Walkaway Joe
programme.desc: Teen billiard whiz Dallas looks up to his dad, Cal, as they share a love for playing billiards. But when Cal leaves their family, Dallas can't stand the absence of his father. He travels to different pool halls across the country in search of his father, until he encounters a wandering loner who tries to help him and gives him a few life lessons of his own.

programme.title: Caught in the Crossfire
programme.desc: Avenging the death of his partner, a police officer's investigations into the murder lead him into exposing a world of corruption where he is hunted by gangsters and crooked cops.

programme.title: Malavita

programme.title: 3 Days to Kill

programme.desc: Spring of 1945 marks the deadliest three months of the Pacific War. As the Allies close in on Japan, Americans find a bloodbath on Okinawa, Australians invade Borneo, and rescued POWs reveal a nightmare in Thailand.

programme.desc: The history of the Russian MiG, American airpower's fiercest rival for over 50 years.

programme.desc: The Seven Seas Explorer cruise ship is full of marble, granite and almost 500 chandeliers.

programme.desc: After a seemingly routine landing, a Boeing 737 erupts in flames, putting 165 debarking passengers and crew in jeopardy.

programme.desc: A commuter flight over France makes a sightseeing detour that sets off a deadly chain of events.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: A Colorado commuter flight crashes five miles short of the runway, and the reasons why rock the airline industry.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: When Germanwings Flight 9525 crashes in the French Alps, investigators discover shocking truths about the co-pilot's mental health.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: After losing its engines and electrical power, pilots attempt to land their Boeing 737 in an Indonesian river.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: A captain's decision leads to a deadly stall over the Java Sea.

programme.title: V-Day: Volcanic Planet
programme.desc: What would happen if all the world's volcanoes erupted on a single day. A look at the devastating effects that would happen, from vast lava flows and giant ash clouds, to floods and severe climate change.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: When a cargo plane crashes at a U.S. airfield in Afghanistan, investigators reach a conclusion that ultimately proves incorrect.

programme.desc: The pairing of a domineering pilot and an inexperienced first officer has deadly consequences in northern Minnesota.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: The crash of a commuter flight leads investigators to a cause known within the industry for years.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2

Meanwhile, his childhood friend Harry Osborn is named the CEO of Oscorp, a nefarious company connected to the disappearance of Peter Parker's parents.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
programme.desc: Peter Parker goes on a trip to Europe with his classmates. Despite planning on leaving his superhero identity behind for the holiday, Nick Fury enlists his help when elementals start to wreak havoc across the continent. It forces him to pick his mask back up and to battle the new threats alongside Mysterio, a master illusionist.

programme.title: Fast Color
programme.desc: A young woman named Ruth abandons her daughter and goes on the run to hide her seismic superhuman abilities. After eight years, she returns home to her judgmental mother and a daughter who doesn't know her but who has inherited similar powers. The two work together to form a bond, harness their abilities and evade capture by Ruth's pursuers.

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Supersoldier Alice, now stripped of her psychic powers, must form alliances and rally survivors in Raccoon City for the climactic battle against the Umbrella Corporation and its ravenous hordes of the undead.

programme.title: The Strangers: Prey at Night
programme.desc: In the shocking sequel to 2008's "The Strangers," a family of four on vacation stop at an isolated trailer park for the night, where they're antagonized by three masked murderers. The twisted trio toy with their prey as they desperately try to survive.

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV stock-market guru and his producer are held hostage during a live broadcast by a man who lost his life's savings due to the host's advice. The captor soon forces the pair to probe a global conspiracy in this intense, timely thriller.

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: This wonderfully unconventional biopic of Beach Boy composer Brian Wilson focuses on two seminal periods in his life: his creative triumphs and mental breakdown as a young man, and his struggles in middle age to wrench free from a domineering therapist.

programme.title: Fast Color
programme.desc: A young woman named Ruth abandons her daughter and goes on the run to hide her seismic superhuman abilities. The two work together to form a bond, harness their abilities and evade capture by Ruth's pursuers.

However, the original group's members died one by one inside different escape rooms as the team progressed into the game. Zoey and Ben try to figure things out so as not to repeat the same tragedy.

programme.title: The Pay Day
programme.desc: A broke and frustrated IT technician decides to embark on a one woman heist to steal valuable data worth millions on the black market.

This origin story explains how Wolverine discovered his unique powers and the mysterious circumstances behind his retractable metal claws. Fanboys will cheer at the introduction of many characters made famous in the "X-Men" comics, including Sabretooth.

Michael McMillian, Jessica Stroup, Jacob Vargas, Flex Alexander, Lee Thompson Young.

programme.title: Beirut
programme.desc: Former diplomat Mason Skiles returns to Beirut in 1982 to act as a hostage negotiator when an old friend is kidnapped by terrorists. However, his mission is complicated by the various agendas of the CIA, the Mossad and the terrorists' leader, as well as his own personal demons.

programme.title: Triggered
programme.desc: After nine former schoolmates have an unexpected reunion, they decide to go on a getaway to the middle of nowhere. They spend their first night together catching up, partying, and drinking themselves senseless. When they wake up the next morning, however, they find that every one of them is fitted with a vest chock-full of explosives. Soon, they learn who the mastermind behind all of this is: Mr. Peterson, their former science teacher and the father of one of their deceased friends.

programme.title: Submergence
programme.desc: While James More is held captive by terrorists in Somalia, thousands of miles away on the Greenland Sea, his lover Danny Flinders prepares to dive herself in a submersible into the deep bottom of the ocean, tormented by the memories of their brief encounter in France and her inability to know his whereabouts.

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: In this weighty farce, superficial playboy Hal Larson (Jack Black) is only interested in attractive women until a self-help guru hypnotizes him. Then, he sees only a woman's inner beauty and promptly falls for a bighearted, 300-pound woman (Gwyneth Paltrow). Bobby and Peter Farrelly directed and wrote the script. Jason Alexander, Joe Viterelli.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: In this high-flying comedy, Uma Thurman gives a superb performance as a shrewish, possessive superhero who gets dumped by her regular-Joe boyfriend (Luke Wilson), and then decides to use her superpowers to exact revenge on him and his new love (Anna Faris). In a hilarious nod to "Fatal Attraction," Thurman substitutes live great-white-shark sushi for the boiled bunny. Directed by Ivan Reitman and written by Don Payne, who has scripted episodes of "The Simpsons."

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Astronauts on the International Space Station retrieve a sample from Mars and discover it contains evidence of intelligent life in this sci-fi thriller. The specimen begins to show signs of aggression, threatening the entire mission.

programme.title: Keep Watching
programme.desc: In this nerve-shredding horror thriller, parents and their three children return from a vacation to find themselves in a battle with masked home invaders. It soon becomes clear that their terrifying ordeal is really a sick and deadly game and if they want to survive, they must kill or be killed.

Then, he sees only a woman's inner beauty and promptly falls for a bighearted, 300-pound woman (Gwyneth Paltrow). Bobby and Peter Farrelly directed and wrote the script. Jason Alexander, Joe Viterelli.

programme.title: Escobar: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: A young man is invited into Pablo Escobar's inner circle when he begins dating the drug kingpin's niece. In time, he realizes that he will have to do horrible things in order to maintain his extravagant lifestyle in this enthralling crime drama.

programme.title: On Sacred Ground
programme.desc: An investigative journalist finds himself right at the center of a land dispute between an oil company and the Standing Rock Indian Reservation. The oil company has taken over the land to build a new pipeline and has been dealing with constant protests and pressure from the locals.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Astronauts on the International Space Station retrieve a sample from Mars and discover it contains evidence of intelligent life in this sci-fi thriller. The specimen begins to show signs of aggression, threatening the entire mission.

programme.desc: In this poignant romantic comedy, Jason and his best friend Julie decide to have a child together, but not be a couple. While the arrangement works at first, soon they each grow jealous of the other's outside relationships, and all their friends who are married with kids also start having serious relationship problems.

programme.title: Men in Black: International
programme.desc: A new team is protecting the earth from a special kind of shapeshifting alien in this sci-fi comedy adventure. But as two agents attempt to defend the earth against this alien threat, another enemy closer to home penetrates the organization in the form of a mole.

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: In this uproarious black comedy, five gal pals reunite for a wild bachelorette party in Miami. However, their friendships are tested when they must cover up the fact that their festivities accidentally caused the death of a male stripper.

programme.title: Incarnation

Their celebration is short-lived, however, when they begin to realize that they got more than what they bargained for. As a sinister force begins to create more chaos for the young couple, they are forced to find a way to survive.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil

programme.title: Absolutely Anything

programme.title: 12 Mighty Orphans
programme.desc: This sports drama fictionalizes the inspiring story of the Mighty Mites: a formidable football team that consisted of scrawny orphans from Fort Worth, Texas. National glory was attained through their coach Rusty Russell (an orphan himself), who taught them the innovative techniques that made up for their relative lack of brawn.

programme.title: Breaking Up
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Salma Hayek star as an on-again, off-again couple whose relationship works only when they're having sex. Minister: Abraham Alvarez. Directed by Robert Greenwald.

programme.title: A Boy. A Girl. A Dream
programme.desc: Sparks fly between two strangers throughout the night of the 2016 Presidential election. A racial harassment incident brings them closer together, allowing each of them to rediscover their artistic dreams (filmmaking for him, being a DJ for her).

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: In this thundering war thriller set during the Allies' final push into Europe in April 1945, a battle-weary Army sergeant leads a Sherman tank and its crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines.

programme.title: X-Men
programme.desc: The Marvel Comics classic is brought to dazzling life with state-of-the-art visual effects in this sci-fi blockbuster. Patrick Stewart stars as Professor Xavier, who brings together a group of outcasts and trains them to harness their special powers, turning them into a team of superheroes.

programme.title: 12 Mighty Orphans

National glory was attained through their coach Rusty Russell (an orphan himself), who taught them the innovative techniques that made up for their relative lack of brawn.

programme.title: Here Today
programme.desc: Veteran comedy writer Charlie Burnz meets New York street singer Emma Payge when she wins him in an auction. They later form a unique bond that starts when he brings her to the E.R. after a food allergy incident, and the doctors mistake them as a father-and-daughter tandem. As Emma gets to know Charlie's life, she takes it upon herself to help him fix things before it's too late for him to achieve his last life goals.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: A doomed German submarine is carrying a special coding device and a U.S. sub crew is sent out to rescue the vessel, but German forces have picked up the distress call and are already en route to save their comrades.

programme.desc: In this thundering war thriller set during the Allies' final push into Europe in April 1945, a battle-weary Army sergeant leads a Sherman tank and its crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines.

programme.title: Jockey

When rookie jockey Gabriel arrives at the track, Jackson feels inspired by the young man's grit and vows to claim one final championship before his time is up, all the while grappling with an unexpected revelation from Gabriel.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: This terrifying horror film stars Sarah Michelle Gellar as an American nurse in Tokyo who encounters a supernatural spirit spreading a deadly curse. Takashi Shimizu directed the thriller, a remake of his own creepy Japanese cult hit "Ju-on."

programme.desc: To save her brother's life from a dangerous prison gang, Sally must smuggle a mysterious cargo package in her truck. When the FBI starts following Sally, she finds out she's transporting a teenage girl. What ensues is a suspenseful journey that challenges Sally's moral compass.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony poses as a prisoner in an undercover operation, and is chained to a thief (Frank Whaley) he helped to escape in an effort to locate stolen Iraqi antiquities. Deputy Secretary of State Anna Elliott: Annie Corley. Tony: Michael Weatherly.

Cindy Ames: Gina St. John. Sheriff Lester: Mark Damon Espinoza. Kate: Sasha Alexander.

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Caroline tries to make a good impression when she meets Bobby's family at a party, but she isn't prepared when his mother and sisters keep comparing her to his ex-girlfriend. Making things worse, the diner gang decides to tag along.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: Gluons, Guacamole, and the Color Purple
programme.desc: When Sheldon is no longer academically challenged at Medford High, he audits a college class taught by Dr. John Sturgis.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A geologist coworker's MacArthur Genius fellowship award leaves Sheldon stone cold jealous. Meanwhile, Howard stumbles upon a remote-control Stephen Hawking action figure that he invented. Hawking appears as himself.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A great divide develops between Sheldon and Leonard when it comes time to divvy up their shared belongings. Meanwhile, with Bernadette heading into her pregnancy homestretch, Koothrappali and Stuart battle to be the one providing her the most help.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Wolowitz baby arrives, while Sheldon and Amy celebrate Amy's birthday.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy regale Leonard and Penny with details of their not-so-excellent adventure visiting his mother in Texas over the holidays.

programme.title: Abe Lincoln in Illinois
programme.desc: A profile of Abraham Lincoln details his early struggles to make a living, his courtships, his legal experience, and his election as 16th President of the United States.

programme.title: Kings Row
programme.desc: A one-time playboy becomes the victim of a vengeful doctor in this drama about murder, insanity and sadism in a small town at the turn of the century.

programme.title: Air Force
programme.desc: This World War II tribute to the B-17 Flying Fortress "Mary Ann" follows the exploits of the American bomber crew serving in the Pacific theater after its involvement with the Japanese at Pearl Harbor. George Amy won a Best Editing Oscar.

programme.title: The North Star
programme.desc: A Russian farming collective endures Nazi atrocities when Germany occupies their village in 1941. When the local children are subjected to involuntary blood donations and medical experiments, resistance begins to grow.

programme.title: Shining Victory
programme.desc: Research psychiatrist Paul Venner and his lab assistant, Mary, work to learn more about dementia praecox, a disease with which his father is afflicted. They fall in love, but soon tragedy strikes. Based on the play "Jupiter Laughs" by A.J. Cronin.

programme.title: Out of the Fog
programme.desc: A Brooklynite and his neighborhood are extorted by a racketeering gangster, though his upwardly mobile daughter, a 21 year old telephone operator, is charmed by him.

programme.title: Navy Blues
programme.desc: A ragtag group of sailors find themselves mixed up in a hodgepodge of romantic misadventures with some pretty girls in Honolulu.

programme.title: Yankee Doodle Dandy
programme.desc: James Cagney stepped into the shoes of legendary showman George M. Cohan and danced off with a Best Actor Oscar. The film chronicles Cohan's life as he reminisces about his early days in vaudeville to his success on Broadway while preparing to meet President Franklin D. Roosevelt. Rosemary De Camp, who plays George's mother, was actually 15 years younger than Cagney. Cagney played Cohan again in 1955's "The Seven Little Foys."

programme.title: Hangmen Also Die
programme.desc: Svoboda kills the brutal Nazi administrator of Czechoslovakia and escapes with the help of Novotny, a professor. Svoboda and 400 other Czechs are soon captured by the Nazis who demand Svoboda surrender, or all the Czech prisoners will be executed. Inspired by true events.

programme.title: Passage to Marseille
programme.desc: During World War II, Devil's Island escapees endeavor to fight for Free France.

programme.title: Confidential Agent
programme.desc: Graham Greene's excursion into man's loyalty, as a Spanish republican agent (Charles Boyer) meets fascist opposition in London. Lauren Bacall, Katina Paxinou, Peter Lorre, Wanda Hendrix, Victor Francen, George Coulouris, Dan Seymour. Fascinating. Photography by James Wong Howe.

programme.title: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House
programme.desc: Manhattan marrieds "trade city soot for sylvan charm" when they move to the Connecticut suburbs, where they experience an endless succession of construction nightmares and fiascoes and their new place turns into a money pit.

programme.title: Sullivan's Travels
programme.desc: A Hollywood director who's made a career out of profitable but frivolous comedies decides to make a movie of sociological and artistic importance, and, dressed as a hobo, takes to the road for research and to see how the other half lives. The Depression-era epic the filmmaker wants to make is called "O Brother, Where Art Thou?" which the Coen Brothers used as the title of their 2000 comedy.

programme.title: The Palm Beach Story
programme.desc: Screwball romp about a wife who decides to aid her struggling-inventor husband by divorcing him, marrying a rich man and then acting as her ex's benefactress, so she heads to Florida, playground to a boozy bunch of wacky millionaires.

programme.title: The Lady Eve
programme.desc: An eligible, socially awkward heir to a brewery empire boards a cruise ship bound for New York and soon becomes the target of the single ladies on the vessel, as well as a trio of card sharks out to swindle the pushover out of his money, until one of them starts to fall for him romantically.

programme.title: Hail the Conquering Hero
programme.desc: During World War II, a marine is discharged because of chronic hay fever, but through a series of misunderstandings his home town mistakes him for a war hero, and with the adulation mounting, he faces the unenviable task of setting the record straight. The script by producer-director Preston Sturges was nominated for Best Original Screenplay.

programme.title: The Great McGinty
programme.desc: The rise and fall of a crooked politico, who comes clean about an unsavory bridge contract, and gets himself and his partner in hot water.

programme.title: The Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Story
programme.desc: A collection of MGM previews for films being released in 1950 and '51, including "An American in Paris," "Royal Wedding" "The Red Badge of Courage," "Show Boat" and "Quo Vadis."

programme.title: Silk Stockings
programme.desc: Musical remake of the 1939 comedy "Ninotchka" features a tuneful Cole Porter soundtrack and tells the tale of a stern Russian emissary sent to Paris on business but discovering the pleasures of capitalism and romance with a movie producer.

programme.title: Dancing Lady
programme.desc: A wealthy young man meets and falls for a down-on-her-luck dancer working at a seedy burlesque house, and he pays her bail when the place is busted, later helping her land a role in a big-time Broadway musical.

programme.title: Roberta
programme.desc: Fred Astaire-Ginger Rogers musical about a football player who gets a crash course in the fashion industry when he inherits a couture empire in Paris.

programme.title: The Barkleys of Broadway
programme.desc: Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers reunited after 10 years for this tunefest about a successful musical-comedy team who break up when she decides to become a "serious" artist. The film score features a reprise of "They Can't Take That Away From Me," which they originally performed in 1937's "Shall We Dance?"

programme.title: Top Hat
programme.desc: Fred Astaire as a stage star, and Ginger Rogers as his beautiful neighbor, dance---and romance---from London to Venice in this tip-top musical full of classic Irving Berlin tunes. Astaire and Rogers' fourth of 10 screen pairings was nominated for Best Picture.

programme.title: A Damsel in Distress
programme.desc: An American entertainer courts a young noblewoman from a London estate at the encouragement of a betting young man, who has placed a wager that she will fall for the dancer.

programme.title: Carefree
programme.desc: A musical love triangle in which a psychiatrist and his friend's girlfriend fall in love. He uses hypnosis to sway her affection back to his friend, but now the psychiatrist must win back her love before the wedding.

programme.title: The Belle of New York
programme.desc: A footloose and fancy-free playboy falls in love with Salvation Army worker. To prove his worth to the girl, he breaks down and gets a regular job.

programme.title: Top Chef VIP
programme.desc: Sacrificar una langosta viva para cocinarla es tan difícil que hay quien piensa en abandonar la competencia. Una inofensiva pechuga de pavo le juega una mala pasada a los menos sobresalientes.

programme.title: El Señor de los Cielos
programme.desc: Saltarse los protocolos, acechar a su presa y asesinarla, es parte del operativo de Tracy Lobo en Mexicali. Aurelio cree que tiene todo bajo control, pero Rutila actúa a sus espaldas.

programme.title: Juego de mentiras
programme.desc: Camila está convencida de que César cometió un grave error, pero se encargará de buscar las respuestas que demuestren su inocencia. Renata hará cualquier cosa para destruir el sueño de Tomás.

programme.title: Dating & New York
programme.desc: After crossing each other's paths on dating app Meet Cute, a boy and a girl lead what seems like a short-lived romance. programme.title: Sophie Jones
programme.desc: Inspired by true experiences of grief, girlhood, and growing up, Jessie Barr's SOPHIE JONES provides a stirring portrait of a sixteen-year-old. Stunned by the untimely death of her mother and struggling with the myriad challenges of teendom, Sophie (played with striking immediacy by the director's cousin Jessica Barr) tries everything she can to feel something again, while holding herself together, in this sensitive, acutely realized, and utterly relatable coming-of-age story.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: In this charming coming-of-age tale set in 2002 Sacramento, an eccentric teenager attending a Catholic high school deals with the pangs of first love and clashes with her mother over her plans for the future.

programme.title: Margaux
programme.desc: Eager for a weekend getaway of parties and relaxation, a group of twentysomethings rents a smart home vacation rental. Yet the home's sophisticated artificial intelligence programming system soon takes control, forcing the friends to fight their way out or face their end.

programme.title: X
programme.desc: In the 1970s, an adult film crew goes to a remote Texas farm to shoot a film. The elderly couple they are renting from is unaware of what the crew intends for their property. But they do take an unusual interest in the young team. When the couple discovers the real intention of the youngsters, a night of profit-making passion turns to terror as they fight for their lives against their enraged hosts.

programme.title: Afflicted
programme.desc: Two young travel bloggers attempting to document their journey around the world experience a bizarre encounter that leaves one of them instilled with superhuman powers in this inventive sci-fi thriller. Now, they must find the woman who infected him during a one-night stand gone awry.

programme.title: Megalodon Rising
programme.desc: When history's greatest aquatic predator returns, the armada of modern warships sent to destroy it has no chance at all.

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: In this affecting, deeply felt drama, a British soldier who was held as a prisoner of war by the Japanese during WWII confronts the guard who tortured him in order to find closure to that painful chapter of his life.

programme.title: Thank You for Your Service
programme.desc: In this gripping drama, a group of U.S. soldiers return home after serving in Iraq in this perceptive drama, but their attempts at reintegrating into civilian life are complicated by their traumatic memories of war and pressure from military brass to remain stoic.

programme.title: Inside Llewyn Davis
programme.desc: A homeless folk singer seeks success in Greenwich Village in the early 1960s, but faces hardship and disappointment during a harsh winter in this captivating period drama. Later, he takes a road trip to Chicago in the hope of impressing a club owner who could give him his big break.

programme.title: Meet Me in the Bathroom
programme.desc: An in-depth look into the early 2000s New York City rock scene. In a time when many thought the city would no longer produce iconic rock bands, a rebirth of sorts swept through the city. Following bands like The Strokes, LCD Soundsystem, Yeah Yeah Yeahs, and more, this documentary takes you back to where it all started. Based on the book written by Lizzie Goodman.

programme.title: Ali and Ava
programme.desc: Ali and Ava spend time together over the course of one month after a brief encounter. Despite the traumas inflicted by Ava's previous relationship and Ali's mounting despair over his crumbling marriage, the unlikely duo finds solace in one another, proving the wholesome power of kindred spirits.

programme.title: Low Tide
programme.desc: Alan and his younger brother Peter find a bag of gold coins in the sand dunes of the Jersey Shore and decide to hide their discovery from Alan's friends Red and Smitty. This secret causes suspicion among the friend group and puts the brothers in danger when criminals and law enforcement get involved.

programme.title: Drunk Bus
programme.desc: A directionless, young campus bus driver and a punk rock Samoan security guard named Pineapple form an unlikely kinship as they navigate the unpredictable late shift known as the "drunk bus." Together, they break out of their endless loop and into a world of uncertainty, excitement and incredibly poor decision-making.

programme.desc: Alex Dall, a university student, seems to be obsessing about rowing. Things change a bit when she meets Dani, a teacher's assistant who later becomes her girlfriend.
